description: The entire population - some 60 million people - are told to stay at home amid the outbreak.
title: Coronavirus: Italy extends emergency measures nationwide
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy extends emergency measures nationwide - BBC News
maintext: Iran has reported 43 new deaths related to the disease in the past 24 hours. At least 237 people have died and 7,161 have been infected across the country since mid-February, although the real figures are believed to be far higher.
